login.email_sent: Check your email for the login link
login.account_not_found: We couldn't find an account with that email address.
login.invalid_password: The password you entered is incorrect.
login.email_not_confirmed: Your email address hasn't been confirmed yet. Please check your inbox.
login.rate_limited: Too many attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
login.account_disabled: Your account has been temporarily blocked. Contact support.
login.password_required: You must enter your password to continue.
login.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
login.mfa_required: A second authentication factor is required to continue.
login.network_error: We couldn't reach the server. Check your connection and try again.
login.generic_error: We couldn't sign you in. Please verify your details and try again.
errors.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Select the desired event, choose your seats and complete the payment process.
faq.a2: It depends on the event policies. Contact support if you have questions.
faq.q3: Where do I find my tickets?
faq.a3: After purchase you can download them from your profile or the link sent to your email.
